property.name: Rules
property.value: {KIRIFUDASH} {F10} (At the end of any of your creatures attacks, if that creature breaks a shield while attacking, you may pay Fire 10 to summon this creature.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Your Team Kirifuda cost up to 1 less to summon. They can't cost 0 or less. Kirifuda Revolution: During the turn you put this creature into the battle zone with the "Kirifudash" ability, whenever any of your creature's attacks, untap all your Team Kirifuda.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this card is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast/summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of the following: ► Destroy one of your opponent's creatures that costs 8 or less: ► Put a creature that costs 8 or less from your graveyard. {ONITIME}: If you and your opponent have a total of 6 or less shields, you may choose both.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at the top 2 cards of your deck. Put one of them into your mana zone, and the other into your graveyard.
